name: ScreenLink
title: screenlink.io
shortDescription: ScreenLink is an open-source alternative to Loom, designed for creating and sharing screen recordings effortlessly. It supports MacOS, Windows, and Linux, catering to a wide range of users from individuals to teams. Users can record screens with integrated camera and microphone feeds, making it ideal for tutorials, presentations, and team updates.
pros: Supports up to 4K recording at 60 FPS
Free tier available for basic use
cons: Limited to 15 videos in free version
Maximum 10 minutes per recording in free version
Supports only one team member in free version
